title: iru nAngezhuttu
sahitya:
iru nAngezhuttirk-kiNaiyE kiDaiyAdu iru vinai aghaTrip-pErinbam nalgumuyar


anupallavi

  marai nAngum pugazha malarayanai nAbhi malar koNDa karumukhil mAlin tiru mantra


caraNam    arum poruL praNavam aLittiDum mudarppadam avarkku nAm aDimaiyenrarai kUvum iDaippadam
 andhattil oLirndiDum nArAyaNa nAmam amudAi init-tAdi mudalvan enrarivikkum
